divs: sighting detailssubjec states: observing visual objects, triangle in shape, every other night, various colors, appearing near home, and staying for a length of time, and up to five objects at a time, approximately every other night. large cockpit, , actual size only seen thru binoculars. elevation 40 to 60 degrees, altitude 150 feet, aproximately 150 yards from individual., observed direction sw or north, disappearing below tree line.prominent colors, red,blue, white in the middle.some of the objects have a red light in the center.w\ blue around the perimeter. objects appear nightly unless it rains, they do not show, until a night or two later.two objects stay around the same spot for hours. sometimes objects can be seen from out living room window. subject observer states ...they are freaked out after sightings.
Summary: VISUAL OBSERVATION OF OBJECTS TRIANGLE IN SHAPE APPEARING EVERY FEW DAYS
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Corydon
There were 2 other sightings in Corydon on or around March 20th 2008
